aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.description1: I'm Gabriel Henrique, a passionate Full Cycle Developer driven by transforming ideas into digital solutions that impact lives. With a practical and creative approach, I dive headfirst into every project, whether building intuitive interfaces with Nuxt.js, Vue, and React, architecting robust backends with NestJS and Fastify, or optimizing infrastructures with Kubernetes and Dokploy. My journey at Bjsolutions and dozens of freelance projects has taught me to deliver high-quality results under pressure, always seeking innovation and efficiency. I'm a relentless problem-solver with a keen eye for design and performance, ready to inspire teams and take corporate projects to new heights with my energy and versatility.

projectsSection.project1Desc: A stunning analytical dashboard with space-inspired visualizations
projectsSection.project2Desc: A social media platform with a unique universe-inspired interface
projectsSection.project3Desc: A content management system with a revolutionary experience
